channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP ERP, localization for CEE countries.
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP ERP, localization for CEE countries.

item.title: CVE-2022-31589|2024-08-03T07:19:06.823Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20erp%2C%20localization%20for%20cee%20countries.
item.description: Due to improper authorization check, business users who are using Israeli File from SHAAM program (/ATL/VQ23 transaction), are granted more than needed authorization to perform certain transaction, which may lead to users getting access to data that would otherwise be restricted.
